column1: On the morning of the next day the Minister of Rumania brought to the palace a letter from the insurgents addressed to the representatives of the powers and announcing that the patience of the insurgents was exhausted
column2: and that they were resolved to enter Durazzo by any means. An identical letter was addressed to the inhabitants of the city.It was then that the Prince decided to abandon Durazzo.The Ministers
column3: having received the message of the insurgents and having been notified of the intention of the Prince to leave the place
column4: met again in the palace in order to find a way of settlement of the vexing financial problem. At the same time the International Commission of Control decided to call on the insurgent camp at Shiak
column6: ) give them the news of the imminent departure of the Prince
column7: and invite them to the city.
